description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller to request permission to start the plane's engines. This is the first step before a flight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request startup
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, request startup

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Startup approved
calls.message: {Call Sign}, startup approved, temp 32, time 40, push to face north

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, startup approved
calls.message: startup approved, temp 32, time 1200 {Call Sign}

description: This is a call to the ground controller to request permission to be pushed back from the gate by a special ground vehicle.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request pushback
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, request pushback

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Pushback approved
calls.message: {Call Sign}, pushback approved, push to face north

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, pushback approved
calls.message: copied, push to face north, {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this single call to request permission for both starting the engines and being pushed back from the gate at the same time.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request startup and pushback
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, request startup and pushback

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Startup and pushback approved
calls.message: {Call Sign}, startup and pushback approved, temp 32, time 40, push to face north

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, startup and pushback approved
calls.message: copied, startup and pushback approved, temp 32, time 40, push to face north {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made by a pilot to the ground controller to request permission to move the plane on the ground from the gate to the runway.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request taxi
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, request taxi

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Taxi to holding point
calls.message: {Call Sign}, taxi via C-N-N2 to holding point runway-14, {QNH 1013}, Squawk 4771

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, taxi to holding point
calls.message: {QNH 1013}, Squawk 4771, taxi via C-N-N2 to holding point runway-14 {Call Sign}

description: This is a specific call made by a military pilot to the ground controller to request permission to move the plane on the ground from the gate to the runway, following a designated route for military aircraft.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request taxi (military)
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, request taxi

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Taxi to holding point (military)
calls.message: {Call Sign}, taxi via NA-P to holding point runway-14, QNH 760, SQUAWK 4771

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, taxi to holding point
calls.message: QNH 760, SQUAWK 4141, taxi via NA-P to holding point runway-14 {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller when they are approaching the runway, to get a final clearance to take off and to switch communication to the airport's tower controller.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Approaching holding point
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, aproaching holding point rwy 14, like to change to tower

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: ATC clearance
calls.message: {Call Sign}, cleared to [Destination] SID ADMIL ONE, climb and cruse FL 290

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Changing to tower
calls.message: over to tower {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call to the ground controller when they are at the end of the runway and ready to take off, to get final clearance and switch to the airport's tower controller.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: At holding point
calls.message: {DHK GND} {Call Sign}, holding point runway 14, like to change to tower

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Contact tower
calls.message: {Call Sign}, contact tower

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Changing to tower
calls.message: over to tower {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made by a pilot to the tower controller to request permission to move onto the runway and prepare for takeoff.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request line up
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, request line up

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Line up and wait
calls.message: {Call Sign}, line up runway 14, report ready for departure

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, line up and wait
calls.message: line up runway 14, call you ready for departure {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call to the tower controller to get permission to move onto the runway and prepare for takeoff to fly a local circuit (a repeating pattern of flight around the airport).

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request line up for circuit
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, holding point runway 14, Request line up for cct

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Line up for circuit
calls.message: {Call Sign}, circuite approved line up runway 14, report ready for departure

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, line up for circuit
calls.message: lining up runway 14 for circuite, call you ready for departure {Call Sign}

description: A pilot makes this call to the tower controller to confirm they are ready for takeoff and to get the final clearance to proceed.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Ready for Departure
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, ready for Departure

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for takeoff
calls.message: {Call Sign}, SID ADMIL ONE, initially FL-130, surface wind 260/60kts, cleared for takeoff runway 14

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, cleared for takeoff
calls.message: s/w copied, runway 14, cleared for takeoff {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made when a plane has flown far enough from the airport to be handed off from the airport's tower controller to the regional air traffic controller for the next part of its flight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Passing 4000ft
calls.message: {DHK TWR} {Call Sign}, passing 4000ft

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Contact control
calls.message: {Call Sign}, contact dhaka control 126.7

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, contact control
calls.message: over to control, good day {Call Sign}
